content: the best friend scrunchie is the perfect last-minute knit gift it is quick stylish and made with love made with hawthorne yarn it offers a soft durable texture that ensures the recipient will enjoy it time and time again this pattern is beginner friendly and works up extremely quickly the scrunchie is worked in stockinette in the round then seamed around a hair tie each scrunchie requires approx 72 yards 1 hank of hawthorne will make at least 3 scrunchies with plenty leftover
